decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with creatures to reanimate using cards like Dread Return and Scrapwork Mutt. The key is to use cards like Stinkweed Imp and Circle of the Land Druid to fuel the graveyard while also generating value with cards like Acorn Harvest and Malevolent Rumble. Town Greeter and Lotleth Giant provide additional win conditions, while Molten Gatekeeper helps protect our combo pieces. The deck also includes some mana fixing with cards like Holdout Settlement and Khalni Garden. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful reanimated creatures.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost, aggressive creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By sacrificing artifacts with cards like Fanatical Offering and Cleansing Wildfire, the deck aims to generate value and gain incremental advantages. The deck includes removal spells like Cast Down to deal with opposing threats, as well as cards like Nihil Spellbomb for graveyard disruption. The mana base includes a mix of lands to ensure consistent color access. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a steady stream of threats to secure victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of counter spells, removal, and card draw. It makes use of Gates to fix mana and gain life, while also providing additional utility. The deck has a mix of efficient creatures and instant/sorceries to maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The key strategy is to control the game early on, gradually building up resources and eventually overwhelming the opponent with threats while keeping them in check with counterspells and removal.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. Using a mix of gates and other creatures to provide defense, the deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a powerful board presence. Prismatic Strands and Brainstorm help with protection and card selection, while Squadron Hawk and Outlaw Medic provide additional threats. The deck also includes some lifegain options with Sacred Cat and Thraben Charm. Overall, the strategy revolves around controlling the game and outlasting the opponent.

The strategy of this Dimir control deck is centered around countering opponent's spells, disrupting their game plan, and controlling the board with removal spells. The deck aims to manage the opponent's resources while digging for key cards with card draw effects like Mental Note, Thought Scour, and Deep Analysis. L贸rien Revealed provides card advantage, while Sneaky Snacker provides a recurring threat. Contaminated Aquifer helps with color fixing while Abandon Attachments can slow down aggressive strategies. The deck also includes powerful finishers like Gurmag Angler and Tolarian Terror to close out the game.

The deck focuses on quickly playing artifacts that work well together, using them to deal damage and control the board. By casting cheap artifacts and sacrificing them for effects, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays and board control. With a focus on artifact synergy and using them for both damage and utility, this deck seeks to outpace opponents and quickly secure a win through aggressive aggression and resource management.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly cycle through cards using cantrips and mana ramp to set up for a big combo turn. The goal is to play multiple spells in a turn to trigger Infectious Inquiry and deal a large amount of poison damage to the opponent. The deck focuses on generating mana and drawing cards efficiently to find the necessary pieces for the combo while also being able to withstand opposing spells with counterspells and hand disruption. The win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with poison counters before they can establish their own game plan.

The main theme of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells. By utilizing cards like Goblin Bushwhacker and Burning-Tree Emissary, the deck aims to quickly build a board presence and deal direct damage to the opponent. With a combination of efficient creatures and powerful spells such as Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Blast, this deck seeks to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to set up their defenses.

This deck focuses on utilizing low-cost aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to quickly apply pressure to the opponent. By constantly deploying threats, disrupting the opponent's game plan, and generating card advantage through abilities like L贸rien Revealed and Shipwreck Sifters, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Additionally, cards like Dihada's Ploy and The Modern Age provide additional utility and card advantage to keep the pressure on. The deck's synergy between creatures and spells allows for efficient aggression and disruption throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by utilizing a variety of spells like counterspells, card draw, and bounce effects to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck focuses on filling the graveyard with instants and sorceries to reduce the cost of casting Cryptic Serpent and L贸rien Revealed. The win condition is to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures like Cryptic Serpent and Murmuring Mystic, while also utilizing cards like Tolarian Terror and Sleep of the Dead to stall the opponent's creatures. The goal is to outmaneuver the opponent and dominate the game through strategic plays and card advantage.

The deck focuses on quickly building up a powerful creature using a combination of auras and enchantments to make it unblockable, hexproof, and highly resistant to removal spells. By placing these auras on low-cost creatures like Slippery Bogle and Gladecover Scout, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive attacks while protecting its creatures from being targeted. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth to ensure consistent mana production and a smooth curve of threats.

This deck focuses on using cheap counterspells and card draw to control the pace of the game, while efficiently casting powerful threats like Cryptic Serpent. L贸rien Revealed helps to generate card advantage, while Sleep of the Dead and Murmuring Mystic provide additional control elements and threats on the board. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain card advantage to secure victory in the late game.

The deck focuses on rapidly damaging the opponent using direct damage spells and creatures with abilities that deal damage. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of burn spells and aggressive creatures that can quickly reduce their life total. The deck benefits from cards that deal damage directly to the opponent or their creatures, as well as cards that allow for card draw and additional mana acceleration to maintain pressure on the opponent. The key strategy is to deplete the opponent's life total before they can stabilize and mount a defense.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent quickly with efficient creatures like Inspiring Overseer and Glint Hawk, while disrupting their game plan with removal spells like Cast Down and Suffocating Fumes. Utilizing bounce effects with cards like Kor Skyfisher and Refurbished Familiar allows for repeated value and tempo advantage. The mana base includes artifact lands like Ancient Den and Vault of Whispers to enable metalcraft and land destruction with Bojuka Bog. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with early aggression and disruption.

This deck focuses on quickly building a board presence of Elves to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive attacks. Utilizing cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to draw more resources, along with mana ramp from Llanowar Elves and Arbor Elf to quickly cast powerful creatures like Timberwatch Elf and Nyxborn Hydra. The deck aims to establish a strong board presence early and maintain pressure through quick and efficient plays, utilizing the synergy between Elf creatures to boost their power and overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize artifacts to quickly and aggressively overwhelm the opponent. With cards like Myr Enforcer and Reckoner's Bargain, this deck can quickly build up a large board presence. Thoughtcast allows for drawing additional cards and Galvanic Blast provides direct damage to finish off opponents. The deck is also supplemented with removal spells like Krark-Clan Shaman and Nihil Spellbomb to disrupt opponent's strategies. By efficiently utilizing artifacts and synergies within the deck, this Aggro - Affinity archetype aims to quickly defeat opponents in a Pauper 1 vs 1 format.
